title: Particles Network
description: An interactive network of connected particles that respond to mouse movement, perfect for tech and digital companies.

css: .particles-network-container{position:relative;width:100%;height:100vh;background:radial-gradient(circle at center,#1a1f35 0%,#0f172a 100%);overflow:hidden}#particles-network-canvas{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%}.content-overlay{position:relative;z-index:1;color:white;text-align:center;padding:2rem;height:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;background:radial-gradient(circle at center,transparent 0%,rgba(15,23,42,0.3) 100%);backdrop-filter:blur(3px)}.content-overlay h1{font-size:4rem;margin-bottom:1.5rem;background:linear-gradient(135deg,#60a5fa 0%,#8b5cf6 50%,#db2777 100%);-webkit-background-clip:text;-webkit-text-fill-color:transparent;text-shadow:0 0 30px rgba(139,92,246,0.5);letter-spacing:-1px;animation:glow 3s ease-in-out infinite alternate}.content-overlay p{font-size:1.25rem;opacity:0.9;max-width:600px;line-height:1.6;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.8);text-shadow:0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)}@keyframes glow{0%{text-shadow:0 0 30px rgba(139,92,246,0.5)}100%{text-shadow:0 0 50px rgba(139,92,246,0.8),0 0 100px rgba(219,39,119,0.3)}}
js: function initParticlesNetwork(){const canvas=document.getElementById('particles-network-canvas');if(!canvas)return;const ctx=canvas.getContext('2d');if(!ctx)return;let width=canvas.width=canvas.offsetWidth;let height=canvas.height=canvas.offsetHeight;const dpr=window.devicePixelRatio||1;canvas.width=width*dpr;canvas.height=height*dpr;ctx.scale(dpr,dpr);let particles=[];const particleCount=width<500?50:100;const connectionDistance=width<500?150:200;const mouseRadius=width<500?150:200;let mouse={x:width/2,y:height/2,radius:mouseRadius};for(let i=0;i<particleCount;i++){const size=Math.random()*1.5+1;particles.push({x:Math.random()*width,y:Math.random()*height,vx:(Math.random()-0.5)*0.5,vy:(Math.random()-0.5)*0.5,size:size,originalSize:size,color:'hsla('+(Math.random()*60+210)+',80%,60%,0.8)'});}function animate(){if(!canvas.isConnected)return;ctx.fillStyle='rgba(15,23,42,0.1)';ctx.fillRect(0,0,width,height);particles.forEach((particle,index)=>{particle.x+=particle.vx;particle.y+=particle.vy;if(particle.x<0||particle.x>width){particle.vx*=-0.8;particle.x=particle.x<0?0:width;}if(particle.y<0||particle.y>height){particle.vy*=-0.8;particle.y=particle.y<0?0:height;}const dx=width/2-particle.x;const dy=height/2-particle.y;const dist=Math.sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy);particle.vx+=dx/dist*0.02;particle.vy+=dy/dist*0.02;const speed=Math.sqrt(particle.vx*particle.vx+particle.vy*particle.vy);if(speed>2){particle.vx=(particle.vx/speed)*2;particle.vy=(particle.vy/speed)*2;}ctx.beginPath();ctx.arc(particle.x,particle.y,particle.size,0,Math.PI*2);ctx.fillStyle=particle.color;ctx.fill();const gradient=ctx.createRadialGradient(particle.x,particle.y,0,particle.x,particle.y,particle.size*3);gradient.addColorStop(0,particle.color);gradient.addColorStop(1,'transparent');ctx.fillStyle=gradient;ctx.fill();particles.slice(index+1).forEach(otherParticle=>{const dx=otherParticle.x-particle.x;const dy=otherParticle.y-particle.y;const distance=Math.sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy);if(distance<connectionDistance){const opacity=(1-distance/connectionDistance)*0.5;const gradient=ctx.createLinearGradient(particle.x,particle.y,otherParticle.x,otherParticle.y);gradient.addColorStop(0,particle.color.replace('0.8',String(opacity)));gradient.addColorStop(1,otherParticle.color.replace('0.8',String(opacity)));ctx.beginPath();ctx.moveTo(particle.x,particle.y);ctx.lineTo(otherParticle.x,otherParticle.y);ctx.strokeStyle=gradient;ctx.lineWidth=(1-distance/connectionDistance)*2;ctx.stroke();}});const dx2=mouse.x-particle.x;const dy2=mouse.y-particle.y;const distance=Math.sqrt(dx2*dx2+dy2*dy2);if(distance<mouse.radius){const force=(mouse.radius-distance)/mouse.radius;const angle=Math.atan2(dy2,dx2);const pushX=Math.cos(angle)*force*5;const pushY=Math.sin(angle)*force*5;particle.vx-=pushX;particle.vy-=pushY;particle.size=particle.originalSize*(1+force);}else{particle.size=particle.originalSize;}});requestAnimationFrame(animate);}let targetRadius=mouseRadius;canvas.addEventListener('mousemove',(e)=>{const rect=canvas.getBoundingClientRect();mouse.x=(e.clientX-rect.left)*dpr;mouse.y=(e.clientY-rect.top)*dpr;targetRadius=mouseRadius*1.5;});canvas.addEventListener('mouseleave',()=>{targetRadius=mouseRadius;});function updateMouseRadius(){if(!canvas.isConnected)return;mouse.radius+=(targetRadius-mouse.radius)*0.1;requestAnimationFrame(updateMouseRadius);}updateMouseRadius();window.addEventListener('resize',()=>{if(!canvas.isConnected)return;width=canvas.width=canvas.offsetWidth;height=canvas.height=canvas.offsetHeight;canvas.width=width*dpr;canvas.height=height*dpr;ctx.scale(dpr,dpr);});animate();}document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',function(){if(document.getElementById('particles-network-canvas')){initParticlesNetwork();}});if(document.readyState==='complete'||document.readyState==='interactive'){setTimeout(function(){if(document.getElementById('particles-network-canvas')){initParticlesNetwork();}},1);}

description: A dynamic flow of geometric shapes and lines creating a modern background pattern.

Add your hero content on top of the animated background
css: .geometric-flow-container{position:relative;width:100%;height:100vh;background:#0f172a;overflow:hidden}#geometric-flow-canvas{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%}.light-overlay{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;background:radial-gradient(circle at center,rgba(96,165,250,0.1) 0%,rgba(139,92,246,0.05) 50%,rgba(15,23,42,0.2) 100%);mix-blend-mode:screen}.content-overlay{position:relative;z-index:1;color:white;text-align:center;padding:2rem;height:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;background:radial-gradient(circle at center,transparent 0%,rgba(15,23,42,0.3) 100%);backdrop-filter:blur(3px)}.content-overlay h1{font-size:4rem;margin-bottom:1.5rem;background:linear-gradient(135deg,#60a5fa 0%,#8b5cf6 50%,#ec4899 100%);-webkit-background-clip:text;-webkit-text-fill-color:transparent;text-shadow:0 0 30px rgba(139,92,246,0.5);letter-spacing:-1px;animation:glow 3s ease-in-out infinite alternate}.content-overlay p{font-size:1.25rem;opacity:0.9;max-width:600px;line-height:1.6;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.8);text-shadow:0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)}@keyframes glow{0%{text-shadow:0 0 30px rgba(139,92,246,0.5)}100%{text-shadow:0 0 50px rgba(139,92,246,0.8),0 0 100px rgba(236,72,153,0.3)}}
js: function initGeometricFlow(){const canvas=document.getElementById('geometric-flow-canvas');if(!canvas)return;const ctx=canvas.getContext('2d');if(!ctx)return;let width=canvas.width=canvas.offsetWidth;let height=canvas.height=canvas.offsetHeight;const dpr=window.devicePixelRatio||1;canvas.width=width*dpr;canvas.height=height*dpr;ctx.scale(dpr,dpr);const shapes=[];const shapeCount=width<500?30:50;let time=0;for(let i=0;i<shapeCount;i++){const type=Math.random()<0.3?'circle':Math.random()<0.6?'line':'triangle';shapes.push({x:Math.random()*width,y:Math.random()*height,size:Math.random()*30+15,type:type,angle:Math.random()*Math.PI*2,speed:Math.random()*0.3+0.1,rotationSpeed:(Math.random()-0.5)*0.02,hue:Math.random()*60+210,opacity:Math.random()*0.5+0.3});}function drawShape(shape){ctx.beginPath();if(shape.type==='circle'){ctx.arc(shape.x,shape.y,shape.size,0,Math.PI*2);}else if(shape.type==='line'){const length=shape.size*3;ctx.moveTo(shape.x-Math.cos(shape.angle)*length,shape.y-Math.sin(shape.angle)*length);ctx.lineTo(shape.x+Math.cos(shape.angle)*length,shape.y+Math.sin(shape.angle)*length);}else if(shape.type==='triangle'){const size=shape.size*1.5;ctx.moveTo(shape.x+Math.cos(shape.angle)*size,shape.y+Math.sin(shape.angle)*size);ctx.lineTo(shape.x+Math.cos(shape.angle+(2*Math.PI/3))*size,shape.y+Math.sin(shape.angle+(2*Math.PI/3))*size);ctx.lineTo(shape.x+Math.cos(shape.angle+(4*Math.PI/3))*size,shape.y+Math.sin(shape.angle+(4*Math.PI/3))*size);ctx.closePath();}const gradient=ctx.createRadialGradient(shape.x,shape.y,0,shape.x,shape.y,shape.size*2);gradient.addColorStop(0,'hsla('+shape.hue+',70%,60%,'+shape.opacity+')');gradient.addColorStop(1,'hsla('+shape.hue+',70%,60%,0)');ctx.strokeStyle='hsla('+shape.hue+',70%,60%,'+shape.opacity+')';ctx.lineWidth=2;ctx.stroke();if(shape.type!=='line'){ctx.fillStyle=gradient;ctx.fill();}}function animate(){if(!canvas.isConnected)return;ctx.fillStyle='rgba(15,23,42,0.1)';ctx.fillRect(0,0,width,height);time+=0.01;shapes.forEach(shape=>{shape.x+=Math.cos(shape.angle)*shape.speed;shape.y+=Math.sin(shape.angle)*shape.speed;shape.angle+=shape.rotationSpeed;shape.size+=Math.sin(time*2)*0.2;if(shape.x<-shape.size*2)shape.x=width+shape.size;if(shape.x>width+shape.size*2)shape.x=-shape.size;if(shape.y<-shape.size*2)shape.y=height+shape.size;if(shape.y>height+shape.size*2)shape.y=-shape.size;drawShape(shape);shapes.forEach(otherShape=>{const dx=otherShape.x-shape.x;const dy=otherShape.y-shape.y;const distance=Math.sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy);if(distance<150){ctx.beginPath();ctx.moveTo(shape.x,shape.y);ctx.lineTo(otherShape.x,otherShape.y);const gradient=ctx.createLinearGradient(shape.x,shape.y,otherShape.x,otherShape.y);gradient.addColorStop(0,'hsla('+shape.hue+',70%,60%,'+(0.1*(1-distance/150))+')');gradient.addColorStop(1,'hsla('+otherShape.hue+',70%,60%,'+(0.1*(1-distance/150))+')');ctx.strokeStyle=gradient;ctx.lineWidth=1;ctx.stroke();}});});requestAnimationFrame(animate);}window.addEventListener('resize',()=>{if(!canvas.isConnected)return;width=canvas.width=canvas.offsetWidth;height=canvas.height=canvas.offsetHeight;canvas.width=width*dpr;canvas.height=height*dpr;ctx.scale(dpr,dpr);});animate();}document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',function(){if(document.getElementById('geometric-flow-canvas')){initGeometricFlow();}});if(document.readyState==='complete'||document.readyState==='interactive'){setTimeout(function(){if(document.getElementById('geometric-flow-canvas')){initGeometricFlow();}},1);}
